definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: A valuable road map for understanding and healing cybersex addictions.
sentences.chinese: 一个网络性爱的理解和治疗吸毒成瘾宝贵的路线图。

sentences.english: And we christen the patients' bed with our final fuck.
sentences.chinese: 用我们最后的性爱，给病床命名如何？

sentences.english: She had sex with 919 guys in a single day, setting a world record.
sentences.chinese: 她在一天和919个男人完成性爱，创造了世界纪录。

sentences.english: It talks about sex but we don't in our churches.
sentences.chinese: 这经大谈性爱，人们却不把它带进教堂。

sentences.english: Explicit sex is on show in the temples, while the movies don't even get to first base.
sentences.chinese: 露骨的性爱在寺庙里上演，而电影甚至不能达到一垒。

sentences.english: Sometimes sex sets you on fire and sometimes it is soothing.
sentences.chinese: 性爱有时会让你激情似火，有时使人得到慰藉。

sentences.english: I'm pretty open-minded when it comes to sex.
sentences.chinese: 我在性爱面前很放得开。

sentences.english: The same sex, the real human self-love.
sentences.chinese: 同性爱，实质是人类的自爱。

sentences.english: Although this method does not compare the perfect sexual affection, it is not also far.
sentences.chinese: 虽然这种方法式比不上完美的性爱，但是也相差不远。

sentences.english: And the sex! The sex is fun as hell.
sentences.chinese: 还有性爱，性爱真他妈有趣极了。

sentences.english: And the sex! The sex is fun as hell.
sentences.chinese: 还有性爱，性爱真他妈有趣极了。

sentences.english: There’s more to sex than pushing the right button.
sentences.chinese: 完美性爱的内涵远比按动正确的“按钮”要多得多。

sentences.english: They share same-sex fantasies or want to try out bi-sexuality.
sentences.chinese: 他们能分享同样的性爱幻想或者想尝试双性恋。

sentences.english: Many women even prefer foreplay to actual sex and orgasm.
sentences.chinese: 相较于真实的性爱和高潮，很多女性更喜性前戏。

sentences.english: Saying" I love you" immediately before, during, or following sex doesn't count.
sentences.chinese: 性爱之前，之后，之中说“我爱你”不算数。

sentences.english: There is a joke of needing a sectioned off sex area as well.
sentences.chinese: 还有一个笑话说需要一片隔离开的性爱地带。

definition: euphemism for sexual intercourse/to go to bed with sb
male and female/both types (acid and alkaline, positive and negative etc)/(chemistry) amphoteric
